content.detailedDescription:
i was visiting my friends who work in the international conference centre in sonnenberg called internationales haus sonnenberg, which is situated in the harz mountains in germany and surrounded on all sides by natioal park deep forest for miles. the nearest town is sankt andreasberg (st. andreasberg), the other side of the moutain, a fair distance away.  
we were all playing pool, when i wanted to come back to our rooms located in a place called the wohnhaus, which is where all the workers stayed. i went back there with my sister, and she heard a noise like a bat which got our attention and we looked around, and saw something moving behind the house. 

 before we knew it, this huge triangular object hovered over our heads and just stayed there.  we were transfixed by it for im not sure how long, my younger sister was scared, as we had no idea what it was.  then it darted at incredible speeds behind the tree line of the mountain.

we ran back to tell the others who thought we were seeing things and laughed at us, so they came out to see it disbeliving us, but there was nothing there, so they laughed at us even more, then we suddenly noticed it was above our heads.
we hadnt even heard it, or seen it , but it was there, a huge huge spinning triangle mayby at a rough guide the size of a football pitch or bigger.  it had lights all on its outside, circular lights. it seemed so close we could reach up and touch it, but we all just stood there, part scared, we went to move into the wohn house a little scared.  but as if it knew where we wanted to go, it moved and hovered over our apartments.
  it was transfixing, it moved like something ive never seen or heard of in my life.  nor had anyone else.  it could change diections lie no other aircraft i know.  

it would dart in random directions across the skyline vanishing behind the trees, then just as quickly coming back and hovering exeactly over our heads. 

i couldnt see its colour, or details as it was very dark, there was no light pollution as we were in the mountains, all we could see was the lights that outlned the object.

after i dont know how long, the object back tracked incredibly quickly behind the trees and we didnt see it again.

we bashed around theories for what it could be, someone said it could be someone playing a trick on us in the forest, or a light display from the town the other side of the mountain.

but these are both impossiple, the reasons, firstly someone has to sit somewhere high up on the mountain, deep in the forest but high enough to somehow see through the trees to the conference centre. the conference sentre itself was in a clearing in the forest,  and the treeline the object vanished behind was a good distance away.  
  in the darkness, not only would someone have to be sitting in a forset where wild boar and puma are prominent wildlife.
 somehow in the darkess they would have to know where we were in the dark.
also lights do not make noise.  this object a few times made like the ultrasound noise you can sometimes hear a bat make. 

as for a light show from sankt andreasberg, this too is impossible, there is no way the light would reach us, yet alone hover over our heads and know where we were, and there was no shows going on in the town of anykind.

we know this was a flying object but what we dont know, we were in such a remote area who knows what it was.
 all we know is that it was nothing we had ever seen before.  i went out on my own a few times in the hope it would come back, but i never saw it again.

i wish i had seen it again i was fascinated, where i live i often see uneplained things, i always have since i was little.
 from ghosts to just things i cant explain.  im good at sensing things. my friends think i was a cat in a former life^^ randomness. but i guess they have their reasons^^

quite often late at night i have looked over the valley from   our window, and seen lights hovering in the sky.  they just stay there.  they could be a plane. there are a few flight paths around but not that low.  

they just hover, then vanish.  my housemate last year was woken by a bright blue light that shone through his bedroom window and blinded him. he had no idea what it was but it scared him.

theres a hill we can see from our window, next to it is the village of christchurch,2 years ago around 1am we were writing essays, and saw a light near the village we watched it for a while,it was very bright, which si what caught our attention.  we watched it move into the woods next to the village where ti stayed. 

after a while, the light started to flash like a code, we went outside to see what it could be flashing to, to see if someone was replying to it, but ti wasnt.  we watched it for awhile trying to figure out what it was.

around 3am (i think) we decided to call the police, as we were worried someone may have had an accident and were flashing for help.

we never ehard anything back from them,and the light still flashes to this day.  though there are often more than one of them, the most ive seen is around 6 lights at once.
its possibe the lights are people hunting in the woods or car headlights? 

probally those are more probable explanations. we did do some research intrigued by the lights in the sky, apprently we are in a ufo triangle, which stems between newport, swansea (and i cant remember the third point sorry:/ ) 

sorry for this huge post, i would have posted my sitings sooner, but  didnt know of this site until i happened to find a reference to it, on a site called tellmewhereonearth.Com .  so i apologise for such a big post.

i included some images one a map of the area, one a a photo of the conference centre to show you a rough view, and the third a very bad sketch to give you a rough idea of what it looked like.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: We heard a bat like sound, and then this huge spinning triangle hovered over our heads.

content.detailedDescription: Did anyone report seeing a ufo christmas day in arvada?  i went out on my kids large back back porch to have a cigarette.  i was looking north and it looked like it was a mile (or less) away.  there was hardly any wind - it was around 4 - 4:30 pm - and stll light outside.  it was round & was hovering - it looked like something was spinning on the bottom.  it was huge - about 40 feet diameter.  it hovered about 5 minutes - then moved to the right (east) about 3 times its' width and turned bright red - looked like a ball of fire - fringed all around like it was burning - this lasted about one minute - then it just disappeared.  i didn't call the family out to see it - they were playing with the grand kids so there were no other witnesses.  just wondered if anyone else saw it - anyway -
content.summary: I saw an object hovering looked like spinning on bottom

content.detailedDescription: I was inside fixing to go to bed and looked out the bedroom window.  there were so many lights that were all moving.  it was something very strange with no sound.  there were so many lights moving coming in from the west.  they seemed to be converging in one spot and then would disappear with more moving in.  this went on for two hours that my wife and i watched.  we even rode in the car trying to get closer with some passing over the car.  there was no sound.  we could not figure out what this was.  we live in a rural area.  where we saw them across the way there is no one living in that area, just cotton fields and trees.  it stopped around 2 o'clock.  we soon went to bed after we noticed no further activity.  it was very frightening not knowing what it was.  have never seen anything like this before.  the next day another strange occurance was that all of our car clocks had lost time.  it seemed as though there may have been a magnetic field that had done something to them.
content.summary: 40--50  flying objects slowly descending over ground, total silence, all we could see were lights moving vertically

content.detailedDescription:
At the time lived at chimney rock apartments @ hwy 59. my aunt, myself, a friend and my mom were in the pool about 10:00 pm. we were talking and swimming..I looked up at the sky and though i was seeing geese flying in v formation. growing up in rosenberg tx i was used to seeing this and hearing them as they flew by. there was no sound...When i said, look at the geese, the color appeared to be pink so i joked and said look at the flamingos...The object was moving slow...Now sound...My friend says those are not birds! my aunt looks up and looks at us and just puts her head down and says i didnt see anything...Then my mom said the same thing...I know that i have been visted and possibly taken since i was about 5 or 6. i remember lights in my room and waking up under my parents bed...Also would try to walk out of the house in the middle of the night. 
all of this is just recently stopped in the last 2 years or so. i know it was real. i even remember the hooded ones in my room and still get goose bumps when i think about it. the lights would come on in my room and i would pass out being scared...Wake up and tell my mom something was happening to me in the middle of the night but she didnt believe me....
content.summary: In the dark sky, form of geese flying ...No sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was working in my backyard. i am a 'skywatcher' and do look up occassionally. looking nnw this morning i noticed 2 white dots at about 55-65 degrees. i have no idea how far away they were. i work outside about 3-4 miles from the burbank airport and have seen, what i believe to be, released weather baloons. i watch them just float up and into the atmosphere. these 2 looked the same except they were going a little bit faster. one of them veered off and did a circle. i thought that odd. then it did another circle. suddenly about 6 other white dots joined the 2. i have no idea what direction they came from. they began to flock around like birds, circling each other and diving in and out. when some of them made turns they lost their brightness like what one would expect from a white bird circling. perhaps this was a bird flocking activity. from the distance i believe i saw the event from they would have had to have been awfully big birds.
the event lasted from 3-5 minutes.
at the end they broke off and went seperate ways and i quickly lost sight of any of them.
content.summary: 6-8 white dots seen 'flocking'

content.detailedDescription: I was at my house, located in conroe, tx, on the afternoon of febuary the 13th. i had stepped outside to smoke a cigarette and wait for my girlfriend to get ready for an upcoming dental appointment. i smoke right outside my garage and almost always look up to the sky. this day was like no other. i was standing there, smoking, and when i looked across the street and up towards the sky, i noticed 2 silver/star objects hovering about 2k feet off the ground and at about 3-4 miles distance from me. looking at the objects, i first thought they were stars. however, the sky was perfectly blue and the wind was blowing at about 10-15mph (direction unsure). as i stared at the 2 objects for a bit longer, one of them shot across the sky coming to a point behind me and my house and once again commenced to hover. this struck me as odd and at this point i knew they were not ballons due to the fact that they were both hovering at different locations and that one had moved to its present location rather quickly and stopped just as quickley. there was no noise or anything emitted by the objects and there were no strange smells or odors in the area as well. both objects sparkled and seemed to blink while hovering in their respective locations. at about this time, 30 minutes had passed and my girlfriend appeared and was ready to go. since we were running behind, i did not mention it to her until later that day. i lost sight of the object once i entered the vehicle since my mind was on driving at the time. i was somewhat disturbed by what i saw. i was a marine for 12 years and am trained to observe my surroundings. i know what i saw and i know that it was not man made or from this planet. no pics or video of the sighting. am curious as to if anyone else in this area has reported seeing anything pertaining to this report or of anything recently.
content.summary: Two silver/star type objects spotted over conroe, tx

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was walking my friends dog up a steep hill
2./3. i heard a lound propeller plane pass overhead and i stopped and looked up and noticed the small black object passing right to left on a west, north west flight path. i thought it was strange there was no sound and no contrail, and no visable wings. i thought maybe it was a plane very high in the sky and that was why i couldn't see the wings. but it passed below the cloud banks so i knew it was not a plane.
4. it flew absolutely straight. it looke like a square disk, like a square with bulging side and it was blsck with a grey spot in the center.
5. it passed into the tree line and i could no longer see it.
content.summary: It was a black disclike obect travelling below the clouds on a west north west route

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my car a block from my apartment complex when i saw a flicker of light in my upper left hand range of sight.  at first i thought it was light refecting off something on my window.  i then looked to where the flicker had been and saw a silver-like disc off in the distance.  at that moment i got really excited and pulled into my apartment complex and stopped in the middle of the lot.  then i grabbed my camera which i sometimes carry with me in case there is something i find interesting to shoot.  keeping my eyes on the object i lifted my camera for the shot.  i had the object focused and in my sights so i pressed the shutter button but to no avail.  in my rush to take the picture i had fogotten to turn the dial switch to on.  i then lowered my camera and keeping my eyes on the object it began to move from left to right to left and gone into the distance.  my feelings afterwards the event where of shock and dibelief.  i also felt lucky but at the same time dissapointed that probably no one would believe me.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Driving i saw a flicker of light in the sky.  i got out of my car and watched it fly away.
Close encounter & low flyover of  triangle craft at less than 100ft

content.detailedDescription:
Http://www.Ufocasebook.Com/news.Html
i filed a report with ufo casebook here is the link.
i fed the cats in the barn and when i was down i walked outside to go to the house. i'm not sure of the time, i fed the cats after coming home from night church which is at 4pm, church usually gets out at 5:30. the last time i looked at a clock was on the way home and it was 5:45, church is about 10-15 minutes away from home. i orignally said the time was between 5:30-6:00p, but after searching the sky the next night i'd say the time was more between 6:30-7:00pm. i walked out of the barn, and the sky was clear i looked up at the stars. the barn is to the west of the house and the door i exited from the barn was on the north side. above me and to the left (west) was a jet flying in the air, i saw the blinking lights and trail it left so i knew it was a jet.   directly above me i saw 3 lights in a triangle, two white lights and a red one in the middle but toward the front and it flew over me heading in a north direction. it was windy outside so i didn't hear any noise. at first i thought it was just an airplane and went inside, but later saw pictures from ufo casebook of another case which fit exactly what i saw. the picture i'm attaching is from another case, but is what i saw.
content.summary: I came out of the barn and looked overhead and lit flew over me.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were sitting in bill and nadas cafe in salt lake city and a stranger - female ask'ed if we like to drive to the mountains to see some ufo's. we said yes. it was about a 30 minute drive east of salt lake and was in the rocky mountains.  it was a beautiful summer night and since we were out of the city, we could see plenty of stars.  the stranger lady told us to watch carefully and we did. as we watched, we realized there were many star
looking objects that would suddenly jolt very quickly, instantly, across the sky.  the strange thing was that they made sudden, instant turns of perhaps 90 degress more or less. at first i thought they were stars but their movement was way to strange for that to be. we watched for a couple of hours or less and left because it was getting late at night.  i never saw the stranger lady again and often wondered why, how, when, and what she knew that i 
didn't.
content.summary: Approx. 12 stars moving quickly, suddenly, at right angles, moving all over the night sky

content.detailedDescription: Remote area of south gulf cove preserve placida florida. my wife and myself were walking our dog. very clear day, many hawks circling drew my eye to the cigar shaped ufo over the trees (trees approximately 1/2 mile away). the ufo was tilted very slightly left end higher. it had rouned ends and no visible tail or wings. same thickness from end to end. i had no idea what is was. the sun glinted off it. i watched it because it seemed to be at a banking angle but was not moving. i called my wife's attention to it. she sighted it as it moved very quickly left to right and was obscurred by a tree in the distance. we ran up the road to see more. i saw it briefly and turned to my wife to see if she could see it. she stated that it had just took off at a very very fast rate towards the south east. i did not see this exit. after, i saw a small aircraft in the same vacinity and it it was easily descernable as a small aircraft. i tried to convince myself that what i had seen was a plane, but the more i thought about it, the more i could not convince myself.
content.summary: Sighted not moving initially. very clear day. no wings or tail. non balistic trajectory.

content.detailedDescription:
In my back yard, between 6:30 and 7am., feeding my cats, an extremely bright object hanging motionless in the southeastern sky caught my attention. my first thought was, a star or satellite, except the sun was up, the object was not moving and no other stars were visible.
the object in question was extremely bright as in a mirror reflection but brighter than the sun or any of several commercial aircraft, flying at various altitudes, in the area. this object was approximately thirty degrees above the horizon, in a southeasterly direction from my house and motionless.  i was very curious to know what it was, as it was extremely bright and unlike anything i've seen before, day or night.  i ran into my house and collected my eyeglasses and a pair of 10x50 binoculars to get a better view of the object. through the binoculars it was still a near blinding spot of white light, no discernable details.
after thirty minutes of viewing, the object was obscured by some drifting clouds.  when those clouds cleared the sky where the object had been, about ten minutes later, it was gone from sight.
tomorrow morning, feb. 16, 2006, i will be at the same place at the same time to find out whether or not this object was a star.
content.summary: Between 6:30 & 7:00am., extremely bright object hanging in southeast sky at 30 degrees above horizon, motionless.

content.detailedDescription:
1.  driving east in my car.  five miles west of hays, ks, city limits on old u.S. hwy 40 (now known as west highway 40). 
2.  i'm very familiar with the skyline, and easily noticed the four, equally spaced, horizontal, yellow lights (round shape) in to the east, north east of my position.  the lights as viewed looked like the warning lights on the tops of four radio towers, but these lights were yellow and sort of oblong  (vertically).
3.  i thought the lights were either the lights on the tops of four new radio towers (which would have been a big surprise since i live in hays and am very familiar with its skyline) or were four new, very bright, very tall interstate  interchange lights.
4.  the lights stayed in roughly a straight line (north to south), with the third light from the left just a bit below the line of the other three lights.  as i drove west, the lights kept getting lower on the horizon, which was opposite of what i thought should happen if the lights were on top of towers.
5.  my response was to ask my son if he saw the lights (he did), ask him how many he saw (he saw four), and ask what color he saw (he said they were yellow).
6.  the lights kept getting lower on the horizon and "winked" out one after the other.
content.summary: Four yellow lights, equidistant, in line, one winked out after the others

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation with my family at disney world orlando fl.
i woke up early went on the balcony to have my coffee. and i saw a brite blinking dot in the sky thought it might have something to do with nasa's launch that day. of the pluto project. my biggest regret it that i watched it for about 2 minuts before i got my video cam out and hit record. then i saw 2 birds fly by so i tiped the cam toward them. and then from behind the hotel came a second object i was glad i caught that it was closer and more detailed first. it was black then faded in and out then it also started to blink siver..Then i tried to put the focus on the camera to infinity and went back to tape and they were just gone in a second like someone hit a light switch and turned them off.......I sent a clip.. i am willing to send you origonal digital tape. (but i will want it back) i dont care if you use my name and video for any purpous you would like i just dont want my kids or wife to be shown if you are interested in this sigting get back to me for origonal digital tape looks much clearer that the one attached....Thanks for you time and work on ufos i want to know what i saw!!!!
content.summary: I could not believe what i was seeing but there they where

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine was driving home near wolforth, texas (outside of lubbock) at  approx. 10 pm and saw the object.  she called me, i went outside and also saw the same thing she saw even though she was approx.  15 miles from me.  it was low in the sky  --just over the treetops in my view.   she was directly under the object and said she could definately see a triaglular shape that was stationary.  the object remained in the same place until she got home-probably another 15 miles.  we both could still see it in the same place..  after about 1 hour of observing object  it started to slowly move northwest and going lower  towards the ground until it was too low to see.  we knew it was not venus although it was in the general direction where venus was but was much larger and brighter.  i looked at the object with binoculers and could see the triangle shape with the point toward the ground.  looking at the object at arms length it was slightly smaller than the size of a dime,  much larger than any visible star or planet in the sky.  i never saw anything on the news about the object.  my friend and i remained in contact with each other the whole time it was visible (about 1 hour).
content.summary: Object was  visible for about 1 hour  in the same location.   then object moved nort west   until out of sight

content.detailedDescription: A lighted disk shape object was hovering west of evergreen, moving slowly. i saw it four separate times within 45 minutes. each time it hovered and then disappeared away from me or moved behind a mountain (floyd hill). i have seen this object three times/ days this week, each time in the late afternoon just before dark. the first 2 times i was driving and was not confident in what i saw. today i was outside my house facing west and had my husband come out and look too. it looked like a very bright star but it was daylight. it faded away from us to the west as we watched. i saw it 3 more times while driving to floyd hill to pick up my child from daycare.
content.summary: Lighted disk hovering and moving slowly
Translucent round-shaped object observed from parking lot affects witness's vision.

content.detailedDescription:
My dad was reading a magazine and i was playing in the back yard.I looked up and saw a giant gleaming h shaped aircraft.The way it flew was so silent an yet fast.It didn't have any lights,signs,or windows.And it didn't look like any kind of ship the military used.As i watched it disappear into the sunset dad called the military base and asked if any special aircraft was flying around.They said they didn't know anything about it.
                                     -kalee h.
content.summary: In the shape of an ''h''.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside at about 9:30 p.M. it was a clear and warm evening.  i was visiting with two friends.  two of us looked up and saw this object moving across the sky, from west to east.  we quickly pointed it out to the third person with us. the object was a white sphere.  there were no visible lights and no sound, that we could hear. it appeared the lights from the city where reflecting off of it.  

in this part of the country there is a lot of commercial air craft flying to the west or to the east.  these commercial aircraft have red, green and white lights that are visible from the ground and you can always hear them fly over.  this obeject was different.  it was moving east, as a lot of aircraft do,but, no sound or lights were detected.  also, it appeared maybe to be moving ( i guess ) at about half the height of these commercial aircraft.  we viewed this object when it was directly over head and watched it for about 30 or more seconds until we could no longer see it.  i guess it flew past our town so the city lights no longer shown upon it.  ( the same thing happens when geese migrate over in the fall and spring.  you can see them as long as there is light reflecting off of them.)  the people i was with along as myself stated that it was "cool!"  for lack of better words.  i am not saying i saw a space craft, but i know what it was not, it was not an aircraft, meteor, planet, star, or flock of birds.  there are no bright stars nor are there any planets in that part of the sky, that i know of.  well, not that move like that.  when i first saw the object i thought it was a latex ballon.  but the longer i looked at it the sooner i gave that idea up.  the two people i was visiting with that night still talk about this event whenever we are together.  after the sighting we talk about for some time, and still do.  

i am not a pilot, but i know all planes or blimps have a green light on one wing and a red light on the other wing along with a white light on the back, sometimes on the wings too.  i saw no wings nor lights.
content.summary: White sphere, no lights visible, moving west to east,
Saturday night, jan. 8 at about 11:34 pm, i walked out of my house in wheat ridge. i glanced up when i noticed how dark the sky was, with very vivid stars. immediately i sensed movement overhead.

content.detailedDescription: my wife, her sister, myself and our kids all saw a very slow moving light in the western sky around 6pm tonight in provo, utah.  we looked at it through my binoculars.  the best way to describe it is two burning gas vents coming off of a center mass.  i have seen several ufo's from time to time but nothing like this.  it took the object several minutes to move what looked like inches to us.  it then began to get dimmer as it moved closer to the horizon.  i have seen more than my share of meteors and satellites.  there is no way that it was either of those two things.
content.summary: Two gas like vents making a v shape coming from a central core

content.detailedDescription: I was with a friend, sleeping on the beach (black's beach). he had gone to sleep in his sleeping bag but i had stayed up to look at the stars. we were both eighteen yrs. old at the time. i was in the habit of looking for passing satellites because i liked to watch them. on this night i saw what at first appeared to be a satellite, but then, as it moved, it began changing directions and zig-zagging about in the sky. i woke my friend up because i had the feeling this was a ufo. he watched it with me as it did these high speed maneuvers. then the object began to descend and grow larger. soon it was sitting above the ocean right at the horizon and it was very bright. as comparison, about twice as bright as the brightest star in the night sky. it just sat there for several minutes above the water and then it began to ascend again. soon it was a tiny spec of light again and then it disappeared, i assume becuase of its distance from earth. i remember this well some thirty years later because it had a big impact on me at the time. my friend and i both felt we had seen a ufo.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: This object went from faint star-like to large ball of light, always white.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was walking north on a neighborhood road at about 1:40
in the afternoon on my way to my office on cruz alta road, i
caught a shiny point of light in my periphery out to the
west high over the mesa at approximately 45 degrees.  the
sharpness of the reflected light appeared and disappeared in
fairly regular intervals, indicating that the object was
either tilting or rotating.   it left no vapor trail, as is
common with all planes that pass through the area.

it's angle in the sky appeared to increase at the same time
that it's definition softened, until i couldn't see it
anymore.  it left the impression that it was moving higher
and farther out west.

then, further along in my walk, i saw what appeared to be a
jet in the same area that i saw the object.  it was quite
far west over the mesa, and left a short dark vapor trail. 
my first interpretation was that it was this i had seen, and
not being able to see both objects at the same time (the
other had faded), i was about to dismiss it.

then, further yet on my walk, the reflective object came
back into view, and i could clearly see it was different
from the object leaving the vapor trail.  it was moving in
an easterly direction on a course to cross my path
perpendicularly, traveling very steady in speed and altitude
with no sudden jerky movements.  all the time, it pulsated
regularly with light reflected from the sun, at
approximately once per second.   eventually, it did come
right over my path.   people driving by could have easily
verified it, but no one seemed curious as to what i was
looking at and i was too wrapped in it to stop anyone.

when it was near overhead, i tried to see what it was. 
since it appeared to be moving in the same direction of the
wind, i couldn't rule out a piece of trash that had been
picked up.  but if it was, it was the only such piece of
trash in the entire clear blue cloudless sky, and it
traveled in a very smooth controlled manner, except for the
"wobbling".   my best interpretation was that is was 50%
reflective and rotating, so that with each revolution it
would once again reflect the light of the sun.  it may have
been disc shaped, but the strong contrast between the
reflective surface and the non-reflective "black" surface
served to disrupt a sense of shape.   the wind was not
blowing steadily at ground level, yet the object moved along
quite smoothly and slowly.  whatever it was doing (wobbling
or rotating), it always appeared to be maintaining the same
"top to bottom" orentation.  in other words, at no point did
it look like it was tumbling end over end, which is what i
would have expected to see at times if it were merely a
piece of trash at the mercy of the wind.

it continued right along, traveling east and toward the
sangre de christo's and "flashing" in the sun, and then
began rising in altitude slowly as it made it's way over the
range and out of sight.   i must have watched it for a good
5 minutes or more from the time it had reappeared, and i
have no definitive conclusions as to what it was.
content.summary: Intermittently reflective rotating object traveling east at a steady altitude and speed.  no vapor trail or sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I was reclining in the backyard on a chaise lounge.  my cat jumped up on my chest as it usually does when i do this.  i closed my eyes for a bit, then the cat started to get too close to my face, so i picked it up to put it on the ground.

that's when i noticed a black shpere-shaped object simply hanging in the air above me.  

it took me a while to figure out what i was looking at.  i couldn't figure out why the object was simply suspended in the air.  it was about the size of venus, or a little smaller, maybe mars.  i knew it wasn't an airplane for sure, as it was simply stuck in the air.  it wasn't moving, except possibly slightly turning to reveal a red area on a different side of the sphere.  this could have been a red flashing light, i don't know for sure.

i kept looking at the object to figure out what it was.  i knew it wasn't a helicopter- for one thing, i could clearly see it was a sphere, and not elongated at all.  for another, there was no noise, and we have helicopters fly over the house almost every day, so i know what a helicopter looks and sounds like.  and i think that a helicopter couldn't be that high anyway.  i mean if it was a helicopter, it would have to be very very high to be the size of venus and anyway, like i said, there was no movement of any kind, which means no props or blades.

i thought perhaps it could be a balloon, but as i said, it was stuck in the air.  in other words, it didn't move at all, except possibly to gently turn over, but as i said, this could have been a red flashing light.  if it was turning over, then it did it very very gently--in other words, there was no bobbing, jerking, jiggling, or erratic movement of any kind.  it just hung there.  very weird.  i finally realized i was very likely looking at a ufo, and i was excited.  i went to get a digital camera, but either the memory card or whatever it is was full, or the camera didn't work.  i think i got one picture, but when i tried to download it to my computer, the computer wouldn't take it.  anyway, i couldn't see the object in the viewfinder, so i just pointed it as best i could and took the picture.  it is exposure 90, but the computer would only go to 89.  i still have it, but i don't know if i was able to point at the object.

i called my mom out to look, but she couldn't see it.  it was only about the size of venus or mars, and the sky was still fairly bright. that was a bit frustrating.  i kept pointing, but she didn't see it. 

it was there for only about 3 minutes.  i wish i could have taken a picture, but i didn't want to go looking for another camera and lose the object.  i kept looking at it, and then finally it just -- disappeared, which i know sounds weird, but that's what happened.  poof.  gone.  i guess it could have sped off so fast i didn't see it.

the next day, i told someone at work about it, and he got excited and kept asking me about it, and said his mom told him a similar thing, but i think that was in phoenix.  anyway, later that day i saw a white sphere, about the size of an average star, and it was gently moving thru the air.  it was kind of erratic. i guess that could have been a balloon, because it wasn't moving very fast and was just meandering thru the sky, but the next say something happened which made me think twice.

on friday, after work, i went outside to see if it was there again, and after scanning the sky, decided to lay back down to duplicate my actions two days before.

my mom came out to ask if i was looking for the object, and about a minute later, a very very fast star-like object flew right above my head ( i mean it was way way up there, but you know what i mean) in the direction i was reclining ( it started at my head and moved in the direction of my feet) and then started 'bouncing' or zig-zagging...Those aren't really the words, because i couldn't see the object actually do those things, i just saw it in one place and then in another and then another - like that- then it straightened out and then another object about 2 seconds behind it did very similar things--i know this sounds crazy but it was almost as if they were confirming that they were ufos and nothing else.  i mean this was three days in a row--if the previous day's sighting was a craft of some kind and not just a balloon.  come to think of it i see the slow meandering kind quite a bit--maybe every month, so those could be balloons i guess.  i have never seen a big balloon like those would be but i have heard about weather balloons. are those really big, completely round and white?

  but there is no way that those fast-moving objects were balloons, jets, meteors or rockets or anything 'conventional'.  for one thing, all those things, except for the balloon of course leave trails of some kind, and these didn't--except for...Well it seems like the air around them was kind of - i don't know, kind of hazy, almost as though they were on a road in the sky.  and it took only about 5 seconds at the most to go from one point in the sky to the other where i couldn't see them anymore.  in other words, clear across the sky in 5 seconds or maybe less. i just thought of something.  take your arm and put it on the table.  point your hand to the ceiling.  now, take about five seconds to lower your hand to the table.

remember that speed, go outside and do the same thing to the sky, and that's how fast the ojects were going.  try to imagine a rocket going that fast.  no way.  i wonder how fast they were going.  thousands of mph, is my guess. 

i just thought of something else.  when they were 'jumping' it was like what a flea does when it jumps.  you can tell it jumped, but you can't see it actually in the air.  that's exactly what it was like.

i almost didn't even make this report; it's not like anyone can really prove it.  and i told someone i didn't know about it and she kind of looked at me like i was drunk or something.  which by the way, i wasn't.  no alcohol, drugs, or mind-altering substances of any kind.  and i wasn't dreaming, as my mom will verify.

  but when i saw the two objects zoom by, compared with the slow moving object i saw the day before, i figured what the heck.  maybe someone else saw at least one of these things.  and i saw where only about 1 in 7 people sees one, and i saw at least 3 or possibly 4 in three days, so i figured this was worth reporting.


definitely the weirdest three days i have ever had.  oh, i wasn't scared at all.  it was very cool.

anyway, feel free to follow up if you think it will help.
content.summary: Black sphere w/red or red flashing light
I did not notice the objects until i downloaded them from digital camera to pc

content.detailedDescription: It was about 7.30 in the morning. i walked with a couple of horses to a meadow.  and then i saw an orange coloured "h"that made a nose dive pulled up and disappeared in the clouds. it was just beside my house. i don't know what it was. not an airplane nor a reflection.
content.summary: An orange coloured "h" shape made a nose dive pulled up and diappesred.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the stars with my dad, when a huge light pooped out of nowhere, and vanished in about 12 seconds.
content.summary: As huge as the empire state building.

content.detailedDescription: On friday october 21, 2005 at 8:35 p.M. at night i was at a neighbors house that is very nearby with some friends. we were out in the backyard on the patio we were grilling barbecue ribs and italian sausage on the outdoor grills out in the backyard. we all looked up and saw 3 circle ufos all 3 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom had red, yellow, and green lights then red, yellow, and purple lights then red and orange mainly red lights then they were a roquefort blue (what i mean by a roquefort blue the lights on the inside of the bottom looked like roquefort and blue cheese salad dressing and they were a light blue the lights looked like roquefort salad dressing and were light blue) they hovered over the treetops in the backyard and still had roquefort blue lights then again red and orange lights mainly red lights. then 3 triangler ufos showed up they were yellow lighted with red dots at every corner. and a huge cone ufo showed up and then all 3 circle ufos and 3 triangler ufos and the cone ufo disappeard they were gone as fast as they came they were all going towards the ocean except one traingler ufo i guess they crashed out in the ocean. and the one trainger ufo looked like it landed in a nearby pasture. we were done grilling our food on the outdoor grills out in the backyard. we went to the pasture where the ufo landed we saw foil and metal wrapped around the trees. it was a clear night outside. and the trianger ufos made a humming sound.
content.summary: While i was with my friends we saw ufos while we were all together.
Slow moving glowing orange ball before the start of an outdoor hockey game.
